column4: Oh, dooglus , then 11.04 may be your last Ubuntu use before moving to another varient - Unity will be the only choice for Ubuntu in 11.10
well it's not that much of a hassle to install GNOME after install 11.10. Surely if you're upgrading from 11.04 you'd still have GNOME as well?
- cablop is currently being activly helped right now - ubottu messages are unwelcome in this senario...
